original_title: The Ugly Duckling in Tales of Mystery
overview: In a dark, eerie cave near the farm, a brood of spooky ghosts are scaring the daylights out of anyone that comes near as they guard over a mysterious secret. The courageous Ugly Duckling as his pal Nico are the only ones brave enough to face the spirits and solve the cave mystery in this playful adventure.
title: The Ugly Duckling in Tales of Mystery
